name: LD31 Super Carrot Farming 3000 Deluxe
description:
And here is the wonderful Super Carrot Farming 3000 Deluxe !!

The best farm defense game ever !

You are a pretty little boy defending his carrots against the evil dead rabbits !

Controls :
- Move with WASD
- Hit with Space
- Action button : E to plant a carrot or to build a snowman

You can play with a Xbox controller too :
- Hit : B
- Action button : A
